trans-unit.source: The XpsFont class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: A classe XpsFont não tem nenhum construtor público.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> method to add a font and obtain a reference to it in a new document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A>método para adicionar uma fonte e obter uma referência a ele em um novo documento.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetFont%2A> method to obtain a font reference in an existing document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetFont%2A>método para obter uma referência de fonte em um documento existente.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetFont%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method of the XpsFont class may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Com base nas configurações de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, a operação de liberação do <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>método da classe XpsFont pode ser atrasado até que todo o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>está fechado.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the font is obfuscated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a fonte é ofuscada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a ofuscação de fonte, consulte a seção 2.1.7.3 "Ofuscação de fonte incorporada" no *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* disponível para download em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the font is obfuscated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a fonte é ocultada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text that uses this font can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto que usa essa fonte pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the use of restricted fonts, see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o uso de fontes restritas, consulte o *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* disponível para download em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if text that uses this font can be changed or edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o texto que usa essa fonte pode ser alterado ou editado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
Ofusca os dados de tipo de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The ObfuscateFontData method is provided for use when you are legally obligated to obfuscate licensed proprietary fonts.
trans-unit.target: O método ObfuscateFontData é fornecido para uso quando você estiver legalmente obrigados a ofuscar licenciadas fontes proprietárias.

trans-unit.source: While this method does not provide encryption, the ObfuscateFontData method can be used to inhibit users from unzipping proprietary [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts and installing them separately for other uses.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto esse método não fornece criptografia, o método ObfuscateFontData pode ser usado para inibir usuários de descompactação proprietários [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fontes e instalá-los separadamente para outros usos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a ofuscação de fonte, consulte a seção 2.1.7.3 "Ofuscação de fonte incorporada" no *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* disponível para download em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
Os dados de tipo para ofuscar.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to use to obfuscate the `fontdata`.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para usar a ofuscar o `fontdata`.
